## Description {#details}

Post-legalization combines on generic MachineInstrs.

The combines here must preserve instruction legality.

Lowering combines (e.g. pseudo matching) should be handled by AArch64PostLegalizerLowering.

Combines which don&#39;t rely on instruction legality should go in the AArch64PreLegalizerCombiner.

<SectionDefinition>

<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   (s32 (g&#95;extract&#95;vector&#95;elt</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///           (g&#95;fadd (vXs32 Other)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///                  (g&#95;vector&#95;shuffle (vXs32 Other) undef &lt;1,X,...&gt; )) 0))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// -&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   (s32 (g&#95;fadd (g&#95;extract&#95;vector&#95;elt (vXs32 Other) 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///              (g&#95;extract&#95;vector&#95;elt (vXs32 Other) 1))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> Dst = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOperand(0).getReg();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llt">LLT</a> Ty = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>.getType(LHS);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The below optimizations require a constant RHS.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Const = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac76eb82370e997f967454f441effbbff">getIConstantVRegValWithLookThrough</a>(RHS, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Const)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> ConstValue = Const-&gt;Value.sext(Ty.getSizeInBits());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The following code is ported from AArch64ISelLowering.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Multiplication of a power of two plus/minus one can be done more</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// cheaply as shift+add/sub. For now, this is true unilaterally. If</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// future CPUs have a cheaper MADD instruction, this may need to be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// gated on a subtarget feature. For Cyclone, 32-bit MADD is 4 cycles and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 64-bit is 5 cycles, so this is always a win.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// More aggressively, some multiplications N0 &#42; C can be lowered to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// shift+add+shift if the constant C = A &#42; B where A = 2^N + 1 and B = 2^M,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// e.g. 6=3&#42;2=(2+1)&#42;2.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: consider lowering more cases, e.g. C = 14, -6, -14 or even 45</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// which equals to (1+2)&#42;16-(1+2).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TrailingZeroes is used to test if the mul can be lowered to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// shift+add+shift.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TrailingZeroes = ConstValue.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a83c7c9008ba213687483b60a658b4a13">countr&#95;zero</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (TrailingZeroes) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Conservatively do not lower to shift+add+shift if the mul might be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// folded into smul or umul.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>.hasOneNonDBGUse(LHS) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlight">        (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-aarch64postlegalizercombiner-cpp-/#a071cfc41eb011cb7d58f6ecc1c61a286">isSignExtended</a>(LHS, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>) || <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-aarch64postlegalizercombiner-cpp-/#a7086cd5bca5812be8a9f6cb9cdba0532">isZeroExtended</a>(LHS, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>)))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Conservatively do not lower to shift+add+shift if the mul might be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// folded into madd or msub.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>.hasOneNonDBGUse(Dst)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64expandpseudoinsts-cpp/#a6cf2f8996b1e9aaf2d7a435aaa62382f">UseMI</a> = &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>.use&#95;instr&#95;begin(Dst);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> UseOpc = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64expandpseudoinsts-cpp/#a6cf2f8996b1e9aaf2d7a435aaa62382f">UseMI</a>.getOpcode();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (UseOpc == TargetOpcode::G&#95;ADD || UseOpc == TargetOpcode::G&#95;PTR&#95;ADD ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlight">          UseOpc == TargetOpcode::G&#95;SUB)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Use ShiftedConstValue instead of ConstValue to support both shift+add/sub</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and shift+add+shift.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> ShiftedConstValue = ConstValue.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#ab6006923d1a3139d70abc8f6552a7960">ashr</a>(TrailingZeroes);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ShiftAmt, AddSubOpc;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Is the shifted value the LHS operand of the add/sub?</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ShiftValUseIsLHS = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Do we need to negate the result?</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NegateResult = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ConstValue.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#ac8c0157adbe12649beac0009c2f6ad8d">isNonNegative</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (mul x, 2^N + 1) =&gt; (add (shl x, N), x)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (mul x, 2^N - 1) =&gt; (sub (shl x, N), x)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (mul x, (2^N + 1) &#42; 2^M) =&gt; (shl (add (shl x, N), x), M)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> SCVMinus1 = ShiftedConstValue - 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> CVPlus1 = ConstValue + 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SCVMinus1.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#ad1b0513de876d1c85cf6268ca21b2c86">isPowerOf2</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ShiftAmt = SCVMinus1.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aae3b959a0a2981340fd03c29f528f2f0">logBase2</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlight">      AddSubOpc = TargetOpcode::G&#95;ADD;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CVPlus1.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#ad1b0513de876d1c85cf6268ca21b2c86">isPowerOf2</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ShiftAmt = CVPlus1.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aae3b959a0a2981340fd03c29f528f2f0">logBase2</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlight">      AddSubOpc = TargetOpcode::G&#95;SUB;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (mul x, -(2^N - 1)) =&gt; (sub x, (shl x, N))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (mul x, -(2^N + 1)) =&gt; - (add (shl x, N), x)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> CVNegPlus1 = -ConstValue + 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> CVNegMinus1 = -ConstValue - 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CVNegPlus1.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#ad1b0513de876d1c85cf6268ca21b2c86">isPowerOf2</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ShiftAmt = CVNegPlus1.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aae3b959a0a2981340fd03c29f528f2f0">logBase2</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlight">      AddSubOpc = TargetOpcode::G&#95;SUB;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ShiftValUseIsLHS = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CVNegMinus1.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#ad1b0513de876d1c85cf6268ca21b2c86">isPowerOf2</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ShiftAmt = CVNegMinus1.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aae3b959a0a2981340fd03c29f528f2f0">logBase2</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlight">      AddSubOpc = TargetOpcode::G&#95;ADD;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlight">      NegateResult = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NegateResult &amp;&amp; TrailingZeroes)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><span class="doxyHighlight">  ApplyFn = &#91;=&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineirbuilder">MachineIRBuilder</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> DstReg) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Shift = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.buildConstant(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llt/#a67021459c7ef8f9a634b4eac7ffd0f96">LLT::scalar</a>(64), ShiftAmt);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> AddSubLHS = ShiftValUseIsLHS ? ShiftedVal.getReg(0) : LHS;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> AddSubRHS = ShiftValUseIsLHS ? LHS : ShiftedVal.getReg(0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Res = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.buildInstr(AddSubOpc, &#123;Ty&#125;, &#123;AddSubLHS, AddSubRHS&#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(!(NegateResult &amp;&amp; TrailingZeroes) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><span class="doxyHighlight">           </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;NegateResult and TrailingZeroes cannot both be true for now.&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Negate the result.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NegateResult) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00566" /><CodeLine lineNumber="566"><span class="doxyHighlight">                     </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;LegalizerInfo&#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, EnableOpt, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>.hasOptSize(),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00567" /><CodeLine lineNumber="567"><span class="doxyHighlight">                     <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>.hasMinSize());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00568" /><CodeLine lineNumber="568"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Disable fixed-point iteration to reduce compile-time</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00571" /><CodeLine lineNumber="571"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Legalizer performs DCE, so a full DCE pass is unnecessary.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00572" /><CodeLine lineNumber="572"><span class="doxyHighlight">  CInfo.EnableFullDCE = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00573" /><CodeLine lineNumber="573"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-aarch64postlegalizercombiner-cpp-/aarch64postlegalizercombinerimpl/#a2734c6056e683d20fb48aef5d3d7fe0e">AArch64PostLegalizerCombinerImpl</a> Impl(MF, CInfo, TPC, &#42;KB, CSEInfo,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00574" /><CodeLine lineNumber="574"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                        RuleConfig, ST, MDT, LI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00575" /><CodeLine lineNumber="575"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#gaa57b1a4e6a1c79233913139635169cf1">Changed</a> = Impl.combineMachineInstrs();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00576" /><CodeLine lineNumber="576"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00577" /><CodeLine lineNumber="577"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MIB = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/csemirbuilder">CSEMIRBuilder</a>(MF);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="578"><span class="doxyHighlight">  MIB.setCSEInfo(CSEInfo);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="579"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#gaa57b1a4e6a1c79233913139635169cf1">Changed</a> |= optimizeConsecutiveMemOpAddressing(MF, MIB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00580" /><CodeLine lineNumber="580"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#gaa57b1a4e6a1c79233913139635169cf1">Changed</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="581"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="582"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="583"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AArch64PostLegalizerCombiner::tryOptimizeConsecStores(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="584"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;StoreInfo&gt;</a> &amp;Stores, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/csemirbuilder">CSEMIRBuilder</a> &amp;MIB) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="585"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Stores.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a1c479a8c434377c2b8cb056bdfdfc201">size</a>() &lt;= 2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="586"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="587"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="588"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Profitabity checks:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00589" /><CodeLine lineNumber="589"><span class="doxyHighlight">  int64&#95;t BaseOffset = Stores&#91;0&#93;.Offset;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="590"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumPairsExpected = Stores.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a1c479a8c434377c2b8cb056bdfdfc201">size</a>() / 2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00591" /><CodeLine lineNumber="591"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TotalInstsExpected = NumPairsExpected + (Stores.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a1c479a8c434377c2b8cb056bdfdfc201">size</a>() % 2);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00592" /><CodeLine lineNumber="592"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Size savings will depend on whether we can fold the offset, as an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00593" /><CodeLine lineNumber="593"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// immediate of an ADD.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="594"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;TLI = &#42;MIB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineirbuilder/#a9ec04f3692b9601036d2d4477c4c3749">getMF</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction/#a3825368aca2bc1550d173660df4da6a6">getSubtarget</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetsubtargetinfo/#ade3f0d8b35d67c43df9425bb730a9a7c">getTargetLowering</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="595"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!TLI.isLegalAddImmediate(BaseOffset))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="596"><span class="doxyHighlight">    TotalInstsExpected++;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="597"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SavingsExpected = Stores.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a1c479a8c434377c2b8cb056bdfdfc201">size</a>() - TotalInstsExpected;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00598" /><CodeLine lineNumber="598"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SavingsExpected &lt;= 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="599"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="600"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="601"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a> = MIB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineirbuilder/#a9ec04f3692b9601036d2d4477c4c3749">getMF</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction/#a810234b6b3d223b7c74a4253fcc5ea5e">getRegInfo</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="602"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="603"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We have a series of consecutive stores. Factor out the common base</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="604"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// pointer and rewrite the offsets.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="605"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> NewBase = Stores&#91;0&#93;.Ptr-&gt;getReg(0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="606"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;SInfo : Stores) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00607" /><CodeLine lineNumber="607"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Compute a new pointer with the new base ptr and adjusted offset.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00608" /><CodeLine lineNumber="608"><span class="doxyHighlight">    MIB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineirbuilder/#ab24db762f0912a99f1e4d9e44eaeaa44">setInstrAndDebugLoc</a>(&#42;SInfo.St);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00609" /><CodeLine lineNumber="609"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NewOff = MIB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/csemirbuilder/#af20c06f6ef57cddf624f531efbaf69e7">buildConstant</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llt/#a67021459c7ef8f9a634b4eac7ffd0f96">LLT::scalar</a>(64), SInfo.Offset - BaseOffset);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00610" /><CodeLine lineNumber="610"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NewPtr = MIB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineirbuilder/#a7aae2634e3c0980c4f68983738b90ff7">buildPtrAdd</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>.getType(SInfo.St-&gt;getPointerReg()),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00611" /><CodeLine lineNumber="611"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                  NewBase, NewOff);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00612" /><CodeLine lineNumber="612"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MIB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineirbuilder/#a035ff811981517c4885338606c70d928">getObserver</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00613" /><CodeLine lineNumber="613"><span class="doxyHighlight">      MIB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineirbuilder/#a035ff811981517c4885338606c70d928">getObserver</a>()-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/giselchangeobserver/#a1f637715070a99aa4140444e12697f9a">changingInstr</a>(&#42;SInfo.St);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00614" /><CodeLine lineNumber="614"><span class="doxyHighlight">    SInfo.St-&gt;getOperand(1).setReg(NewPtr.getReg(0));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00615" /><CodeLine lineNumber="615"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MIB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineirbuilder/#a035ff811981517c4885338606c70d928">getObserver</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00616" /><CodeLine lineNumber="616"><span class="doxyHighlight">      MIB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineirbuilder/#a035ff811981517c4885338606c70d928">getObserver</a>()-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/giselchangeobserver/#a45a05a932f80f51023592ff5131d56a5">changedInstr</a>(&#42;SInfo.St);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00617" /><CodeLine lineNumber="617"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00618" /><CodeLine lineNumber="618"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Split a series of &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; Stores.size()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00619" /><CodeLine lineNumber="619"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; stores into a base pointer and offsets.\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00620" /><CodeLine lineNumber="620"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00621" /><CodeLine lineNumber="621"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00622" /><CodeLine lineNumber="622"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00623" /><CodeLine lineNumber="623"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cl/opt">cl::opt&lt;bool&gt;</a></span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00624" /><CodeLine lineNumber="624" lineLink="#a6569cfd83084b91c7c5379210590ed52"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="#a6569cfd83084b91c7c5379210590ed52">EnableConsecutiveMemOpOpt</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;aarch64-postlegalizer-consecutive-memops&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00625" /><CodeLine lineNumber="625"><span class="doxyHighlight">                              <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/cl/#ac12e6a8f3a1b511f0dee2ed6de0ae806">cl::init</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/cl/#a68075925a54790e71ca790e1d4f21a40a263ac008d8d31f13ce460395fc4cf7e6">cl::Hidden</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00626" /><CodeLine lineNumber="626"><span class="doxyHighlight">                              <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/cl/desc">cl::desc</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Enable consecutive memop optimization &quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00627" /><CodeLine lineNumber="627"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                       </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;in AArch64PostLegalizerCombiner&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00628" /><CodeLine lineNumber="628"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00629" /><CodeLine lineNumber="629"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AArch64PostLegalizerCombiner::optimizeConsecutiveMemOpAddressing(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00630" /><CodeLine lineNumber="630"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp;MF, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/csemirbuilder">CSEMIRBuilder</a> &amp;MIB) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00631" /><CodeLine lineNumber="631"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This combine needs to run after all reassociations/folds on pointer</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00632" /><CodeLine lineNumber="632"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// addressing have been done, specifically those that combine two G&#95;PTR&#95;ADDs</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00633" /><CodeLine lineNumber="633"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// with constant offsets into a single G&#95;PTR&#95;ADD with a combined offset.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00634" /><CodeLine lineNumber="634"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The goal of this optimization is to undo that combine in the case where</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00635" /><CodeLine lineNumber="635"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// doing so has prevented the formation of pair stores due to illegal</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00636" /><CodeLine lineNumber="636"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// addressing modes of STP. The reason that we do it here is because</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00637" /><CodeLine lineNumber="637"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// it&#39;s much easier to undo the transformation of a series consecutive</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00638" /><CodeLine lineNumber="638"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// mem ops, than it is to detect when doing it would be a bad idea looking</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00639" /><CodeLine lineNumber="639"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// at a single G&#95;PTR&#95;ADD in the reassociation/ptradd&#95;immed&#95;chain combine.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00640" /><CodeLine lineNumber="640"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00641" /><CodeLine lineNumber="641"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// An example:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00642" /><CodeLine lineNumber="642"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   G&#95;STORE %11:&#95;(&lt;2 x s64&gt;), %base:&#95;(p0) :: (store (&lt;2 x s64&gt;), align 1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00643" /><CodeLine lineNumber="643"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %off1:&#95;(s64) = G&#95;CONSTANT i64 4128</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00644" /><CodeLine lineNumber="644"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %p1:&#95;(p0) = G&#95;PTR&#95;ADD %0:&#95;, %off1:&#95;(s64)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00645" /><CodeLine lineNumber="645"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   G&#95;STORE %11:&#95;(&lt;2 x s64&gt;), %p1:&#95;(p0) :: (store (&lt;2 x s64&gt;), align 1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00646" /><CodeLine lineNumber="646"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %off2:&#95;(s64) = G&#95;CONSTANT i64 4144</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00647" /><CodeLine lineNumber="647"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %p2:&#95;(p0) = G&#95;PTR&#95;ADD %0:&#95;, %off2:&#95;(s64)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00648" /><CodeLine lineNumber="648"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   G&#95;STORE %11:&#95;(&lt;2 x s64&gt;), %p2:&#95;(p0) :: (store (&lt;2 x s64&gt;), align 1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00649" /><CodeLine lineNumber="649"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %off3:&#95;(s64) = G&#95;CONSTANT i64 4160</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00650" /><CodeLine lineNumber="650"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %p3:&#95;(p0) = G&#95;PTR&#95;ADD %0:&#95;, %off3:&#95;(s64)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00651" /><CodeLine lineNumber="651"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   G&#95;STORE %11:&#95;(&lt;2 x s64&gt;), %17:&#95;(p0) :: (store (&lt;2 x s64&gt;), align 1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00652" /><CodeLine lineNumber="652"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#gaa57b1a4e6a1c79233913139635169cf1">Changed</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00653" /><CodeLine lineNumber="653"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a> = MF.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction/#a810234b6b3d223b7c74a4253fcc5ea5e">getRegInfo</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00654" /><CodeLine lineNumber="654"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00655" /><CodeLine lineNumber="655"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="#a6569cfd83084b91c7c5379210590ed52">EnableConsecutiveMemOpOpt</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00656" /><CodeLine lineNumber="656"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#gaa57b1a4e6a1c79233913139635169cf1">Changed</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00657" /><CodeLine lineNumber="657"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00658" /><CodeLine lineNumber="658"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;StoreInfo, 8&gt;</a> Stores;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00659" /><CodeLine lineNumber="659"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we see a load, then we keep track of any values defined by it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00660" /><CodeLine lineNumber="660"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In the following example, STP formation will fail anyway because</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00661" /><CodeLine lineNumber="661"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the latter store is using a load result that appears after the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00662" /><CodeLine lineNumber="662"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the prior store. In this situation if we factor out the offset then</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00663" /><CodeLine lineNumber="663"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we increase code size for no benefit.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00664" /><CodeLine lineNumber="664"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   G&#95;STORE %v1:&#95;(s64), %base:&#95;(p0) :: (store (s64))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00665" /><CodeLine lineNumber="665"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %v2:&#95;(s64) = G&#95;LOAD %ldptr:&#95;(p0) :: (load (s64))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00666" /><CodeLine lineNumber="666"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   G&#95;STORE %v2:&#95;(s64), %base:&#95;(p0) :: (store (s64))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00667" /><CodeLine lineNumber="667"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;Register&gt;</a> LoadValsSinceLastStore;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00668" /><CodeLine lineNumber="668"></CodeLine>
